document.full_text: former hollywood publicist gene shefrin, who represented don rickles, guy lombardo and dick clark during a career spanning 42 years, has died after a battle with parkinson's disease. he was 90.
document.title: hollywood publicist gene shefrin dead at 90
lines_and_colors: former hollywood publicist gene shefrin, who represented don rickles, guy lombardo and dick clark during a career spanning 42 years, has died after a battle with parkinson's disease. he was 90.
